LanguageData.RB_Bee_Organic_Drone.label: organic drone
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Organic_Drone.description:
Organic bees are genetically modified bees that extract cellulose fibers from nearby plants and convert it into a slurry of genetic material which can be refined into template genomes. The main use of these bees, however, is to hybridize them with other bees to create genetic bees of different subspecies.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 5 days hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Organic_Queen.label: organic queen
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Organic_Queen.description:
Organic bees are genetically modified bees that extract cellulose fibers from nearby plants and convert it into a slurry of genetic material which can be refined into template genomes. Production time: 5 days hours
Nocturnal: No

LanguageData.RB_Bee_Cattle_Drone.label: cattle drone
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Cattle_Drone.description:
Cattle bees have muffalo genes spliced in their genome. They are covered in a thick white pelt, and produce milk, wool and muffalo genetic material.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 72 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: -15ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

LanguageData.RB_Bee_Cattle_Queen.description:

LanguageData.RB_Bee_Clucking_Drone.label: clucking drone
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Clucking_Drone.description:
Clucking bees have chicken genes spliced in their genome. They are covered in feathers, and produce eggs and avian genetic material.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 72 hours
Nocturnal: No

Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

LanguageData.RB_Bee_Exploding_Drone.label: exploding drone
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Exploding_Drone.description:
Exploding bees have boomalope genes spliced in their genome. These bees produce chemfuel, and boom genetic material.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 72 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: Chemfuel
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

LanguageData.RB_Bee_Horned_Drone.label: horned drone
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Horned_Drone.description:
Horned bees have thrumbo genes spliced in their genome. They take a very long time to generate honeycombs, but they produce highly sought after colossal genetic material.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 20 days
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: -30ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

LanguageData.RB_Bee_Horned_Queen.description:

Bee Traits:

LanguageData.RB_Bee_Megaspidery_Drone.label: megaspidery drone
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Megaspidery_Drone.description:
Megaspidery bees have insectoid genes spliced in their genome. They are covered in chitinous plates and produce insect jelly and insectoid genetic materials.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 72 hours

Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC

LanguageData.RB_Bee_Mousy_Drone.label: mousy drone
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Mousy_Drone.description:
Mousy bees have rodent genes spliced in their genome. They produce rodent genetic materials and many find their constant high-pitched squeaking sounds to be quite distracting.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 48 hours
Nocturnal: No
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC

LanguageData.RB_Bee_Purring_Drone.label: purring drone
LanguageData.RB_Bee_Purring_Drone.description:
Purring bees have cat genes spliced in their genome. They produce feline genetic materials and a lot of videos on the internet.

Bee Traits:

Production time: 72 hours
Nocturnal: Yes
Pluviophile: No
Unusual plants needed: No
Minimum Temperature: 0ºC
Maximum temperature: 30ºC
